function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Handling of infectious viral samples in the laboratory","Impact":"Potential spread of contagious diseases within the laboratory environment","Mitigation":"Use of appropriate personal protective equipment, adherence to biosafety protocols, and regular disinfection of surfaces and equipment","Technologies":"Laboratory biosafety cabinets, UV light disinfection systems","People":"Laboratory personnel, researchers, and support staff","Owner":"Laboratory management and biosafety officers"},{"Description":"Exposure to viral aerosols during experimental procedures","Impact":"Inhalation of viral aerosols leading to respiratory infection","Mitigation":"Use of appropriate respiratory protection, implementation of engineering controls to contain aerosols, and monitoring of air quality","Technologies":"High-efficiency particulate air (HEPA) filters, ventilation systems, air quality monitoring devices","People":"Researchers, support staff, and anyone present in the experimental environment","Owner":"Facility management, occupational health and safety personnel"},{"Description":"Improper disposal of viral samples and contaminated materials","Impact":"Risk of environmental contamination and potential exposure to infectious agents","Mitigation":"Use of appropriate biomedical waste disposal methods, decontamination of laboratory materials, and strict adherence to waste management protocols","Technologies":"Biomedical waste autoclaves, chemical decontamination agents, waste segregation systems","People":"Laboratory personnel, waste management staff, and environmental health officers","Owner":"Laboratory management and waste management team"}]}
